description: Raksa-Eng Notation, the notation for portable chess game string
value: <pieces on board> <turn [w|b]> <king&queen moved [----|KQkq]> <king attacked [--|Kk]> <countdown [-.-|-.4]> <pieces in graveyard>

code.moved: KQkq: WhiteKing has moved | WhiteQueen has moved | BlackKing has moved | BlackQueen has moved
code.moved: K-kq: WhiteKing has moved | BlackKing has moved | BlackQueen has moved
code.attacked: Kk: WhiteKing has been attacked | BlackKing has been attacked
